author: Morgan Mondell
comment: I would have gave a 5-star review. I love my Discover card. But after 9 to 10 months a very careful, responsible spending and always paying before the due date. I've been turned down for a credit increase from$200. You know what 25% utilization rate is on $200???!! $25!! Why have a cc that I can only charge $25 to a month? Looking into other cc companies.

author: Christian Medina
comment: Loving the new recent update. The UI appeals to me. Overall great app, easy to use and I haven't run into any problems with it so far. Keep up the good work Discover!  Edit: 3/2/18 It's been a month and I still believe this is a good app, no complaints yet.

author: Lisa Gale
comment: Love my mobile App! Quick secure way to manage all of your accounts needs. With 24/7 credit monitoring and Risky Websites you never have to worry about Fraudulent activity. Customize your account for alerts and pretty much anything you would like them to help you with. Fast friendly service via live or an online agent there always ready to help! Excellent Card!

author: J C
comment: It has problem logging on every other time, no matter if Im on wifi or my data, it still just buffers. Its up to date.  An update on review, I uninstalled and logged back in to make a payment, seemed to work but after logging off I tried to log back in and the same buffering problem. Whats the deal Discover , you guys are major players why is your app not regular

author: Camila Perez
comment: The messaging and secure inbox features don't work anymore. On February 2, 2018 I contacted support through the messaging feature and I got a reply quickly. However, when I tried to write back, my message could not be sent. I got an error saying that the conversation was already resolved. I deleted the app's data from my phone, which got rid of the unsent message. The problem isn't resolved though. At the top of the Messaging screen a message says "Connecting..." , then "Still trying to connect...", but nothing happens. I still can't write back. When I try to send a message, it says I have no internet connection, which is not the case. I tried to submit this error through Secure Inbox, but the Send buttongl would do nothing.

author: Chateau Christensen
comment: My biggest problem with the app is that I can't ever open it. It will sit on the loading screen and spin for 20 minutes before I give up on it. I have a galaxy s6 and have problems at least every third time I try to use the app. I'm uninstalled and redownloaded, tried on different networks, wifi, mobile, with no luck. Very disappointed.

author: Erica Jordan
comment: I've been using this app for almost two years and it has never failed me. Notifications helped me review and keep track of my purchases. Customer service is very responsive and helpful with all my issues. Overall this app has helped me alot from keeping track of my spendings to paying my bills.

author: Gina Green
comment: This app worked great on my iPhone but I recently switched to an Android & this app seems to have problems. After I scan my finger print, it says loading.... But won't load. Doing this for weeks now. Even after uninstalling & reinstalling. Love my discover card though!

author: Heather Beegle
comment: I've only been able to successfully login 1 time and then it wouldn't let me do anything. And I've had to update it 3 times since January. I just deleted it and downloaded it again to see if that helps

author: Michael Vega
comment: I had a problem with your payment department not putting my payments through on time!! Better get this fixed.  You are not explaining the new tagging system well enough! Iam still confused! Call me to better explain this for me. I am deducting one star for these issues. Not happy at this time. ☹☹

author: Michael Jaudes
comment: The app is great for credit card holders, but the bank account integration is flaky sometimes, and the app likes to take over randomly when I'm using another app. It can be annoying. The maintenance and delays with banking are annoying too. There is a disconnect between the banking portion of the services compared to the credit service. Please fix this, discover!

author: Sergey Nastich
comment: The bank is amazing. The app could be improved, but is still very good compared to other US banks. I don't like how clumsy transaction list is - it shows only data startig from my last statement, scrolls back to top when I tap "load more", and is out of sync with balance around midnight. Also, design is kinda 2010 - could be more modern.

author: Izandro Marquez
comment: I like my Discover card and bank account, but the app just plain sucks. On a daily basis, I am bound to encounter at least one glitch. It is an absolute headache. It seems to constantly forget that I already set up a passcode or fingerprint and will repeatedly ask me to request/enter verification codes. The app needs a visual update. They also need to create widgets that actually work too. I must add, these issues aren't exclusive to Android. Although I seem to have less problems on iOS, some of these exact same concerns happen on both platforms. Lastly, functions/features seem to be down quite often due to maintenance, and maintenance takes longer than any other banking institution I have ever used. By far.

author: A Google User
comment: 2018. Refuses to load 9/10 times I try. I've updated. I've uninstalled. I've cleared cache.  The app still hangs on load on my new flagship phone. I'm a DC user since 1990.  I'm about to cut it up because I can't manage it anymore with the app.

author: MissT -
comment: Awesome app but could be better organized. Once you get used to it it's pretty great. Love that I can check my score in seconds  Edit: love the new layout so far

author: Proloy Mitra
comment: One simple bank transfer ach to akes 7 days to complete. Out of reality banking services.. every time I ach one transaction takes 5-7 business days.. what a joke.

author: David O.
comment: This app makes it difficult to exit or close. I think some of these reviews are fake, because it is not as easy to use as they say. It is also very slow at showing up to date information such as payments received. Online payments are not posted for several days after the money is received by Discover. My visa card is much easer to manage through my bank's app.

author: Angela Collins
comment: Other than the new update, this app was great. Now with the upsate, it doesn't allow me to view my balance. For some reason it appears cut off on screen

author: Jacob Odell
comment: Great app! I only wish that they would combine the discover bank account on the same app as the discover card. Right now you have to log out of your card to see your discover bank info.

author: Thomas Devin
comment: I swear I have problems with every other app I use but with Discover I've never seen a bug or had an issue. Props to the developers for creating an amazing user experience!

author: Thomas Ruszczyk
comment: Great for managing your cards. Easy to use and navigate. The best customer service ANYWHERE. PERIOD.  Cannot stress that enough.  Discover wants your business and understands life throws you curve balls. Just talk to them. They will do anything and everything they can to help. Their staff is friendly and knowledgeable.

author: Aaron Miller
comment: The app works very well. The only thing I dislike is how often it's limited because they update it sooo much. (It really is a good thing though)

author: Allen Miller
comment: I was pleased with this app until it started giving problems. When I log in it pulls up a loading screen but never loads anything. To get it to load I have to uninstall the app and then reinstall it. And even then it will log in one time. Then does the same thing all over again.

author: Dean Lewis
comment: It is easy to use, has a lot of functionality, never have trouble getting in. The latest release moved things around. Still getting used to but think it will be easier to get basic information.

author: Fidel Rodriguez
comment: Easy to pay my bill.  My only complaint is logging out and exiting the app is an awkward process on my galaxy s8plus.

author: David D
comment: A major flaw in this app is that it will not close without killing it from the "all active apps" screen.  I can't imagine why this would be overlooked by a company like Discover.   Other than that, it is just OK.

author: Casey Oleson
comment: The app works great. Has all the easiest ways of navigating via mobile. I love my Discover card! So it's no surprise that the app is well done too!!!

author: Gabby Esposito
comment: Always says that is loading and never works. I've redownloaded multiple times and nothing works. I always have to go on my laptop to check.

author: Justin Staley
comment: The old Discover app was far better. This last update is much harder to use. Why do you have to keep changing things around.

author: Blue Wdswrth
comment: Every 3 days I have to uninstall and reinstall to get it to work. When working it is great. Just frustrating...

author: Shannon McCall
comment: App opened up first two times, now just hangs forever at a blank screen with a loading message. Tried forcing app to stop, still didn't work. Junk.

author: roland6663
comment: Only issue with it that I have is I can't view the spend analyzer in app. The 'spend analyzer' is discovers visual representation of how much you spent in a month, and what you spent it on. You can view this on the desktop, but not a phone.

author: Sherrie Schmidt
comment: I love Discover and their app! I can view all transactions, tag them, freeze my card if needed, pay from phone. Excellent app!

author: marvin Clinton
comment: Love the Discover mobile app. I'm able to view my spending currant balance and past balance as well get up today credit score as well as getting alerts about my account from things I purchase to as well as fraud alerts on my account.
I love my discover card and i used to love the app. The latest update dropes it to just a like. I don't like the layout or ease of finding things.

author: Clark Hunter
comment: Great app, let's me stay on top of my credit card usage, protects me from identity theft. And can easily make payments with my bank account. I also love the quick view widget for my home screen.

author: Andrew Huff
comment: Steals focus when it logs you out. Kinda annoying.

author: Angie Barba
comment: The new landing page is too cluttered.  Hard to tell what you are looking at.  Prior version was preferable.

author: Yibo Xu
comment: 1. Alert push notifications won't show the whole content (not able to expand), swiping away opens the app??? This is not making any sense...   2. Wish the app could remember the card/bank tab.   3. Each transaction is taking too much vertical space, the fixed top account info takes 1/3 of the screen all the time...

author: Lee Tompkins
comment: I have NEVER been able to get into my account with the app.  I always get an error, "we are sorry, but certain features of the mobile app are unavailable..." and wont let me past login screen.  If I attempt an incorrect login, that displays an "incorrect login" error, so I know that isnt the problem.  S8 phone, so shouldnt be an old phone compatability problem.  Will uninstall app.
